The service also includes a great range of tools to help you manage your funding information. Our free local sites also provide a premium service and are worth trying if you work in one of the geographic areas covered.

templates.home:
{{#ifAll @root.data.auth.email ~}} {{else}}

Login

{{/ifAll ~}}
templates.logout-foot:
<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
  window.setTimeout(function() {
    firebase.auth().signOut().then(function() {
      setCookie('emailer_token');
      setCookie('emailer_cookie');
      window.location.href = '/';
    }).catch(function(err) {
      console.error('Error signing out:', err);
    });
  }, 1000);
});
</script>
